00022 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_Configuration implements ArrayAccess {

00029         const PACKAGE_KEY = 'MailformPlusPlus';
00030         
00037         protected $setup;
00038         
00045         public function __construct() {
00046                 $this->setup = $GLOBALS['TSFE']->tmpl->setup['plugin.'][$this->getPrefixedPackageKey() . '.'];
00047         }
00048         
00056         public function merge($setup) {
00057                 if (isset($setup) && is_array($setup)) {
00058                         $settings = $this->setup['settings.'];
00059                         $settings = t3lib_div::array_merge_recursive_overrule($settings, $setup);
00060                         $this->setup['settings.'] = $settings;                  
00061                 }
00062         }
00063         
00064         public function offsetGet($offset) {
00065                 return $this->setup['settings.'][$offset];
00066         }
00067         
00068         public function offsetSet($offset, $value) {
00069                 $this->setup['settings.'][$offset] = $value;
00070         }
00071         
00072         public function offsetExists($offset) {
00073                 if (isset($this->setup['settings.'][$offset])) {
00074                         return TRUE;
00075                 } else {
00076                         return FALSE;
00077                 }
00078         }
00079         
00080         public function offsetUnset($offset) {
00081                 $this->setup['settings.'][$offset] = NULL;
00082         }
00083         
00090         public function getSettings() {
00091                 return $this->setup['settings.'];
00092         }
00093         
00100         public function getSourcesConfiguration() {
00101                 return $this->setup['sources.'];
00102         }
00103         
00110         public function getPackageKey() {
00111                 return self::PACKAGE_KEY;
00112         }
00113 
00120         public function getPackageKeyLowercase() {
00121                 return strtolower(self::PACKAGE_KEY);
00122         }
00123         
00130         public function getPrefixedPackageKey() {
00131                 return F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::PACKAGE_PREFIX . '_' . self::PACKAGE_KEY;
00132         }
00133         
00140         public function getPrefixedPackageKeyLowercase() {
00141                 return strtolower(F3_GimmeFive_Component_Manager::PACKAGE_PREFIX . '_' . self::PACKAGE_KEY);
00142         }
